content.rendered:
All meetings begin at 7 p.m. unless otherwise noted.   Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.

July 1, 2022  Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223  Time: 8:00 a.m.

  • Please note this meeting was live-streamed through webex instead of youtube.

July 28, 2022  (Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223)

  • 5:30 p.m: Board Workshop to discuss safety and security with District Emergency Response Team members 
  • 6:30 p.m.: Public Hearing: District-wide Safety Plan
  • 7 p.m.: Regular BOE Meeting
  • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    August 25, 2022  (Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223)

    • Executive Session at 6:30 p.m.
    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    September 13, 2022  (Division Street Elementary School)

    • Employee Recognition for 25 Years of Service at 6:30 p.m.
    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m
    • Watch the meeting through youtube

    September 29, 2022 (Dorothy Nolan Elementary School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m
    • Watch the meeting through youtube

    October 13, 2022 (Geyser Road Elementary School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    October 25, 2022 (Greenfield Elementary School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    November 8, 2022  (Lake Avenue Elementary School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    November 16, 2022 Budget Workshop (MacFadden Administration Building) Time: 6 p.m

    • A Board of Education workshop to discuss the budget development process

    November 21, 2022 Special Meeting of the Board of Education  (MacFadden Administration Building) Time: 6 p.m

    • A special meeting of the Board of Education will be held to approve a resolution related to the Legacy Capital Project.

    December 13, 2022  (Caroline Street Elementary School) 

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.

    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    January 10, 2023  (Maple Avenue Middle School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.

    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    January 26, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.

    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    February 9, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    February 28, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    March 7, 2023  Budget Workshop (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School) 

    • The workshop begins at 6:30 p.m.

    March 15, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Executive Session at 6:30 p.m.
    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    March 21, 2023  Budget Workshop (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • The workshop begins at 6:30 p.m.

    March 30, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    April 18, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    May 9, 2023  Budget Hearing & Regular Meeting  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School) 

    • Budget Hearing  at 6:30 p.m.
    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    May 17, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.
    • Watch the meeting through youtube.

    June 8, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)

    • Code of Conduct Public Hearing at 6:45 p.m. Click here to view a draft of the 2022-2023 Code of Conduct.
    • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.

    June 20, 2023  (Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School)
